name: PRO_JOB_COSTING_RPRT
body_snippet:
procedure PRO_JOB_COSTING_RPRT(PARM_FROM_DATE DATE,
                                                 PARM_TO_DATE   DATE,
                                                 parm_cust_id_from number,
                                                 parm_cust_id_to   number,
                                                 parm_so_id_from  number,
                                                 parm_so_id_to    number,
                                                 Parm_order_type_id number,
                                                 PARM_ORDER_NO VARCHAR2,
                                                 PARM_ORDER_NO_TO VARCHAR2,
                                                 parm_set_of_book_id NUMBER,
                                                 parm_rowset_id NUMBER) is
begin
  delete from temp_code_combination_criteria;
  Commit;
   pckg_fsg.populate_fsg_acct_useage_help(parm_set_of_book_id,parm_rowset_id);
  pckg_account_inquiry.populate_account_criteria(5,'0-00-000-01~Z-ZZ-ZZZ-01');

  DELETE FROM TEMP_JOB_COSTING;
  Commit;



  FOR i IN (

select so.so_ref_no, -- char(50)---
       c.company_name customer_name, --char--
       sum(d.Kgs) Kgs, --number--
       sum(d.Dzn_pair) Dzn_pair, --number--
       sum(d.weight) weight, --number--
       a.issue_amount Knitting, --number--
       round((sum(d.Kgs) * c.issue_amount_c) / tt.total_kgs, 2) Dyeing, --number--
       d.issue_amount_d Packing_Accessories, --number--
       ------------ total Material ------
